elementSets.title: ISBD elements
elementSets.description: This is a registration of classes and properties from International Standard Bibliographic Description (ISBD), consolidated edition, published by De Gruyter Saur in July 2011 (ISBN 978-3-11-026379-4).

vocabularies.title: ISBD Content Form
vocabularies.description: Content form categories reflect the fundamental form or forms in which the content of a resource is expressed.

vocabularies.title: ISBD Content Form Qualified Base
vocabularies.description: Compound terms for qualified ISBD content forms that map to RDA/ONIX Framework for Resource Categorization base content categories.

vocabularies.title: ISBD Content Qualification of Dimensionality
vocabularies.description: Content qualification sub-categories for the number of spatial dimensions in which the image content of a resource is intended to be perceived which expand the content form category of image.

vocabularies.title: ISBD Content Qualification of Motion
vocabularies.description: Content qualification sub-categories for the perceived presence or absence of movement in the image content of a resource which expand the content form category of image.

vocabularies.title: ISBD Content Qualification of Sensory Specification
vocabularies.description: Content qualification sub-categories for sensory specification, a human sense through which the content of a resource as published is intended to be perceived, which expand content form categories.

vocabularies.title: ISBD Content Qualification of Type
vocabularies.description: Content qualification sub-categories for type which expand content form categories.

vocabularies.title: ISBD Media Type
vocabularies.description: Media type categories record the type or types of carrier used to convey the content of the resource. Categories generally reflect the format of the storage medium and housing of a carrier in combination with the type of intermediation device required to render, view, run, etc., the content of a resource.
